name: PDFWidgetCellState
desc: The state of a button annotation, either on, off, or mixed.

items.name: case onState
items.desc: The button widget is in a selected state.

items.name: case offState
items.desc: The button widget is in an unselected state.

items.name: case mixedState
items.desc: The button widget is in a mixed state, neither on nor off.
